title: Software Engineer - Audio NEW!
full_description: Software Engineer Responsibilities: + Utilize strong coding skills in C/C+++ Generate automated unit, regression and integration tests+ Write clean, high performance, maintainable code+ Develop and maintain 8x8's shared VoIP client software stack (C/C++ code) for Windows, Mac OSX, iOS and Android+ Develop and maintain 8x8's Media-Relay Server and RTP Media-Server products+ Become intimately familiar with 8x8's VoIP client and media-server codebases Required Skills: + Strong proficiency in C/C+++ 5+ years experience in C+ Thorough knowledge of the standard libraries (ISO/ANSI)+ Strong experience/knowledge of low-level threading primitives and developing real-time multi-threaded environments+ Strong knowledge of working with TCP/IP sockets (BSD/WinSock)+ Windows core audio development experience (WASAPI) Good to have: + Working knowledge of audio processing algorithmsABOUT 8x88x8, Inc.
